note.p: Dealer in shells. In Margate, Kent, 1841. Of 5 High Street, Deptford, Kent, from at least 1848. Superannuated shipwright in H.M. Dockyards, late publican, 1851.
Census returns of England and Wales 1841 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/468/3/17/26), 1851 (HO107/1584/434/28)
Prerogative Court of Canterbury will registers (The National Archives: Public Record Office PROB 11/2192/379)
